reviews.name: Nix Kiff
reviews.text:
If only I could give 0 stars, but such an option is not available. Extremely disappointed with the service provided by this dental clinic, particularly with Dr. Goh. Despite the positive reviews given by many, the experience was far from satisfactory. Dr. Goh made commitments regarding the completion of a crown within two sessions, only to change the plan abruptly to require three sessions, causing considerable inconvenience given the time constraints and urgent need to work overseas which have been explained to her repeatedly.

Despite the request for an explanation, Dr. Goh failed to provide one personally, relying instead on the customer service team to address her mistake. This lack of accountability only intensified the situation, highlighting her insincerity.

She only made the helpful people from the customer service team to front her mistake made. Would strongly advise against seeking dental care from this clinic and waste your money especially so if you're rushing for time. And especially not an appointment with Dr. Goh.

reviews.text: I've always had a phobia with dentists in the past due to some of them being excessively rough and impatient. Phobia cured with Dr. Shobana. Extremely gentle and explained all steps during the treatment. And not a single drop of blood was observed. Truly a pleasant experience.

reviews.text: I buat veneer, whitening, and scalling. Dua dua doktor terbaik ü§ç Love sangat. Dental assistant sangat baik.

reviews.name: Rashmika
reviews.text:
I had an amazing experience with Dr Ashwin and Dr Sho! I consulted them regarding my discolored teeth and expressed that it had been one of my biggest insecurities. They were incredibly attentive, patiently listening to all my concerns and clearly explaining the various whitening options available to me.

They took the time to answer all my questions, ensuring I felt comfortable and informed before moving forward with any treatment.

Once I felt confident in the plan, we proceeded with the procedure, which took about 90 minutes. Throughout the process, Dr. Sho was professional and thorough, and the dental assistants were highly efficient, providing excellent support. The whole team made sure I was at ease, and the entire experience was smooth and stress-free.

I am so pleased with the results and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the level of care and expertise provided. I highly recommend Dr. Ashwin and Dr. Sho to anyone looking for top-notch dental care.

reviews.text:
My wife and me recently had a root canal treatment and dental crown  by Dr Ashwin at ‚ÄòKlinik Pergigian Rakyat Dental, Perling‚Äô, and I was satisfied with the experience.
He was extremely patient and took the time to explain every step of the procedure, which really helped ease my nerves. His professionalism and gentle approach made the entire process smooth and surprisingly painless.

The staff was also very friendly and welcoming, making the overall experience even better. I truly appreciate the care and attention Dr. Ashwin provided, and I highly recommend him to anyone in need of dental treatment.

reviews.text: The queue system have some issues. Because not a proper way for queue when clinic closed and patient reach early. I face a situation when I arrive on 1.30pm (Clinic open on 2pm), already have 2 patients seat on the chair, we consider is third. Time around 1.40pm, a group of 3 ladies, just direct stand and Q at clinic‚Äôs door and without asking opinion from patient came early. And 3 minute later, another guy just reach also direct queue behind that mentioned group. Is very unfair to the patient reach early and push behind on the waiting queue. I advise clinic to do something about this like have number/tickets system. To avoid this unhappy issues happen. Tq

reviews.name: Nur Filzah
reviews.text: Klinik ni patut improvise on their appointment arrangement. Setiap kali teman orang appointment ke sana, mesti masa menunggu lama betul. 1 hour of waiting, baik tak payah make appointment. As if semua orang punya appointment pada waktu yg sama (contoh: 2pm) lepastu diminta ikut turn padahal kita datang memang sharp at 2 but still dikira lambat & have to wait for hours? Macam kita tak ada kerja lain pula. Appointment shud make it faster & smoother. Ini tidak, appt at 2, sampai sharp at 2 pun masih kena tunggu berjam. Another issue is, patient braces bertukar doktor? Consult dengan doktor lain, datang appointment dengan doktor lain. Lepastu treatment plan berbeza. The doctor pun unsure apa plan yg sepatutnya untuk patient. How is that possible???? Kita bayar, bukan datang review free free. Sedih ya bila kena macamni setiap kali datang klinik.
